item.description:
A day at the movies....I am waiting to hear about group pricing so details are a bit up in the air but the plan is to see the 2:30 show of Watchmen.

I will send out an email with more details on pricing as soon as I firm up the details.....

Keep an eye out for possible brunch before or dinner after the movies.....

Hope to see you at an event soon!
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet in front of the movie theater......
item.name: Watchmen in IMAX
